note:
I research. I read. I think. Then I write.

History. Politics. Social Responsibility. Art. Science.

Science teaches us how to live. Art teaches us what we live for.

Long-time small business owner currently downsizing services to write more. Worked in historic preservation, conducted oral histories, and produced low-budget documentaries. Pivoted to building websites and tech advising for non-profits and small businesses. Have practically no social media footprint.
